alert.note: Alert for Barry; McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 10:53PM CDT until April 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McDonald County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wheaton, or 14 miles west of Cassville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Sugar Creek State Park... Roaring River State Park... Cassville... Seligman... Exeter... Washburn... Eagle Rock... Wayne... Powell... Ridgley... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
